pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wavelet Approaches to Studies of Synchrony in Ecology and Other Fields // Tools for a wavelet-based approach to analyzing spatial synchrony, principally in ecological data. Some tools will be useful for studying community synchrony. See, for instance, Sheppard et al (2016) doi: 10.1038/NCLIMATE2991, Sheppard et al (2017) doi: 10.1051/epjnbp/2017000, Sheppard et al (2019) doi: 10.1371/journal.pcbi.1006744.
